ComicInfo.Summary:
Has Anyone Seen My Killer?: Professor Tinsley experiments to bring back the dead Boynton Beast but instead becomes the feared killer himself.
The Haunted Dollhouse: Mr. Randall buys a dollhouse for his daughter Mandy but soon the dolls inside come to life.
The Face in the Ball!: John Benson finds his future by gazing into a crystal ball.
The Supernatural Swindler: Warren makes a living selling bogus supernatural items, but has he stumbled onto the real thing?
Ball of String!: Ethan collects a huge ball of string.
Roehmer's Revenge!: In the closing days of World War II a low-ranking Nazi officer has a plastic surgeon change his face so he can remain free from capture.
The Queen Who Lived Again!: Moira Fate is hired to star in a movie about three historical Queens, and she seems to already know more about them than anybody else.
The House That Hate Built!: Clem Atwill tries to use his money to become powerful but soon realizes that he's wasted his money on a mirage.
Death of the Man Who Never Lived: After a robbery goes wrong and Bremer kills Mr. Hubbard, he tries to pin the murder on Adams only to discover that Adams is a robot.
Wake Me Before I Die!: Arthur Kinnison is slowly driven mad by lack of sleep when he can't decide what is reality and what is a dream.
The Menace of Wrecker's Reef!: Big Ed and his friends are trapped by a sea monster.
The Day Nobody Died!: Hans manages to capture Death, preventing anyone in the area from dying.
Mis-Judgment Day: A con man and his wife trick a cult into believing he is their savior.
ComicInfo.Writer: Carl Wessler,Dave Wood,George Kashdan,Jack Oleck,George Kashdan,Jack Oleck,Carl Wessler,Dave Wood
